item.title: 中国将打击新兴产业投资中的 "羊群行为
item.description: 中国国家计委官员周五表示，中国将打击新兴行业投资中的 "羊群行为"，并加强对地方政府投资促进活动的监督。【原文：China will crack down on "herd behaviour" in investment in emerging sectors and tighten oversight of local governments' investment promotions, officials at the state planner said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道英特尔三位高管将在制造业调整中退休
item.description: 英特尔公司周四向路透社透露，英特尔制造业务部门的三名高级管理人员将退休，新任首席执行官陈立武将实施全面改革，以重振这家陷入困境的美国芯片制造商。【原文：Three senior executives in Intel's manufacturing operations are set to retire, Intel told Reuters on Thursday, as new CEO Lip-Bu Tan implements sweeping change to resuscitate the struggling U.S. chipmaker.】

item.title: 阿托斯报告上半年订单和收入下降
item.description: 法国IT集团Atos周四公布了今年上半年订单和收入下降的报告，原因是法国商业活动低迷和市场环境充满挑战。【原文：French IT group Atos on Thursday reported a decline in orders and revenue for the first half of the year, attributing the drop to subdued commercial activity in France and a challenging market environment.】

item.title: 欧洲公司清醒认识特朗普的新关税现实
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的新关税制度于本周五启动，欧洲各地的生产商都感受到了影响，一些生产商暂缓发货，另一些生产商则提高贴纸价格或削减利润。一些生产商担心他们根本无法生存。【原文：As U.S. President Donald Trump's new tariff regime clicks into gear on Friday, producers around Europe are feeling the impact, some holding back shipments, others hiking sticker prices or taking a hit to margins. Some fear they won't survive at all.】

item.title: 中国太阳能巨头去年悄然裁员三分之一
item.description: 中国最大的太阳能企业去年裁员近三分之一，公司文件显示，中国政府钦点的推动经济增长的产业之一正面临价格下跌和大幅亏损的困境。【原文：China's biggest solar firms shed nearly one-third of their workforces last year, company filings show, as one of the industries hand-picked by Beijing to drive economic growth grapples with falling prices and steep losses.】

item.title: 金融科技公司急于在香港融资，以利用加密货币热潮
item.description: 随着香港周五开始接受稳定币发行商牌照申请，金融科技公司正急于在香港融资，为加密货币领域的扩张提供资金。【原文：Fintech companies are rushing to raise equity in Hong Kong to fund expansions in cryptocurrencies, capitalising on investor fervour as the city starts accepting applications for stablecoin issuer licences on Friday.】

item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望：【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu:】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，高盛准备以 171.3 亿美元的估值收购冰淇淋生产商
item.description: 据《金融时报》周五报道，高盛准备以 150 亿欧元（171.3 亿美元）的估值收购冰淇淋生产商 Froneri。【原文：Goldman Sachs is poised to buy into ice cream maker Froneri at a 15 billion euro ($17.13 billion) valuation, the Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 预计美国 7 月就业增长缓慢；失业率预计升至 4.2
item.description: 美国 7 月份的就业增长可能放缓，失业率预计将回升至 4.2%，但这可能不足以刺激美联储很快恢复降息，因为关税正开始刺激通胀。【原文：U.S. job growth likely slowed in July, with the unemployment rate forecast rising back to 4.2%, but that probably would be insufficient to spur the Federal Reserve to resume cutting interest rates soon as tariffs are starting to fan inflation.】

item.title: 文件称，空乘人员就 MAX 9 面板爆裂事件起诉波音公司
item.description: 据《西雅图时报》（Seattle Times）周四报道，去年 1 月，阿拉斯加航空公司（Alaska Airlines）的 737 MAX 9 飞机在飞行途中机舱面板发生爆炸，飞机上的四名空乘人员将波音公司告上法庭，要求赔偿身心伤害。【原文：Four flight attendants on the Alaska Airlines 737 MAX 9 plane hit by a mid-air cabin panel blowout in January last year are suing Boeing for physical and psychological injuries, the Seattle Times said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国就业市场疲软引发社交媒体对经济繁荣时代的怀旧情绪
item.description: 中国的就业和收入前景日益暗淡，这促使人们在社交媒体上热衷于谈论 20 年前中国高速增长时期的时尚和文化，分析人士认为这是一种既能表达对经济不满，又不会招致审查的方式。【原文：Dwindling job and income prospects in China are fuelling intense social media chatter about the fashion and culture of the country's high-growth period 20 years ago, in what analysts describe as a way to express discontent about the economy without attracting censorship.】

item.title: 美国贸易不确定性导致亚洲工厂活动恶化
item.description: 由于全球需求疲软和美国关税的不确定性挥之不去，企业士气低落，给亚洲脆弱的经济复苏前景蒙上了阴影，7 月份亚洲工厂活动出现恶化。【原文：Asia's factory activity deteriorated in July as soft global demand and lingering uncertainty over U.S. tariffs weighed on business morale, clouding the outlook for the region's fragile recovery.】

item.title: 标准普尔制造业采购经理人指数显示：受出口拖累，中国制造业活动萎缩
item.description: 周五进行的一项私营部门调查显示，由于新业务增长放缓导致制造商缩减生产规模，中国 7 月份的工厂活动有所恶化。【原文：China's factory activity deteriorated in July, as a softening of new business growth led manufacturers to scale back production, a private-sector survey showed on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普实施新关税税率，美元走强；日元跌至四个月低点
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对数十个贸易伙伴设定了新的关税税率后，美元兑其主要同业货币在周五保持了上涨势头，创下了近三年来最好的一周。【原文：The dollar headed for its best week in almost three years against its major peers, maintaining momentum on Friday after U.S. President Donald Trump set new tariff rates on dozens of trade partners.】

item.title: 首席执行官蒂姆-库克称苹果准备打开钱包，在人工智能领域迎头赶上
item.description: 苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）周四表示，这家 iPhone 制造商准备投入更多资金，通过建立更多数据中心或收购人工智能领域的大型企业，在人工智能领域赶超竞争对手。【原文：Apple CEO Tim Cook signaled on Thursday the iPhone maker was ready to spend more to catch up to rivals in artificial intelligence by building more data centers or buying a larger player in the segment, a departure from a long practice of fiscal frugality.】

item.title: 台湾政府称美国关税税率是暂时的，将协商降低税率
item.description: 台湾总统及其内阁周五表示，美国征收20%的关税将是 "暂时的"，政府将在完成最后阶段的谈判后继续倡导合理的关税税率。【原文：Taiwan's president and his cabinet said on Friday 20% U.S. tariffs will be "temporary" and the government will continue to advocate for reasonable tariff rates as they complete the final stage of negotiations.】

item.title: 澳大利亚部长称美国关税将保持在 10
item.description: 澳大利亚贸易部长唐-法雷尔（Don Farrell）周五表示，白宫已确认没有任何国家的对等关税低于澳大利亚，这表明美国总统唐纳德-特朗普维持对澳大利亚商品征收10%的基准关税不变。【原文：Australia Trade Minister Don Farrell said on Friday the White House had confirmed that no country had reciprocal tariffs lower than Australia, suggesting U.S. President Donald Trump had left the 10% baseline tariffs on Australian goods unchanged.】

item.title: 美国加征新一轮关税，亚洲股市下跌，就业数据紧随其后
item.description: 在美国对数十个贸易伙伴征收高额关税之后，亚洲股市周五下跌，而投资者则在焦急地等待美国就业数据，这些数据可能会决定美联储下月降息的成败。【原文：Asian shares fell on Friday after the U.S. slapped dozens of trading partners with steep tariffs, while investors anxiously await U.S. jobs data that could make or break the case for a Fed rate cut next month.】

item.title: 关税影响担忧与俄罗斯供应威胁并存，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 周五油价变化不大，上一交易日下跌超过1%，原因是交易商正在消化美国新的更高关税可能会抑制经济活动并降低全球燃料需求增长的影响。【原文：Oil prices were little changed on Friday after falling more than 1% in the previous session as traders digested the impact of new higher U.S. tariffs that may curtail economic activity and lower global fuel demand growth.】

item.title: 芯片需求强劲，韩国 7 月出口超预期
item.description: 周五的贸易数据显示，由于芯片需求强劲，韩国 7 月份出口连续第二个月增长，超出市场预期。【原文：South Korea's exports rose for the second straight month in July, beating market expectations on strong chip demand, trade data showed on Friday.】

item.title: 韩国采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，受关税担忧影响，韩国工厂活动连续第六个月萎缩
item.description: 周五的一项商业调查显示，由于美国关税的不确定性拖累了产出和订单，韩国工厂活动在7月份连续第六个月萎缩。【原文：South Korea's factory activity contracted for the sixth straight month in July, as uncertainty over U.S. tariffs weighed on output and orders, a business survey showed on Friday.】

item.title: 日本 7 月工厂活动 PMI 再度下滑
item.description: 周五的一项私营部门调查显示，由于需求疲软使生产再次陷入萎缩，日本制造业活动在上个月短暂企稳后，于7月份出现萎缩。【原文：Japan's manufacturing activity shrank in July after briefly stabilising in the previous month as weak demand pulled production back into contraction, a private sector survey showed on Friday.】

item.title: 交易失败后，星空集团正在考虑布里斯班赌场股份的其他方案
item.description: 澳大利亚星空娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）周五表示，在其香港投资者拒绝延长关键的交易期限后，该公司正在考虑布里斯班新皇后码头赌场和酒店综合体 50% 股份的替代方案。【原文：Australia's Star Entertainment said on Friday it was considering alternative options for its 50% stake in Brisbane's new Queen's Wharf casino and hotel complex, after its Hong Kong-based investors declined to extend a key deal deadline.】

item.title: 特朗普对来自数十个国家的美国进口商品设定的新关税税率是多少？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四宣布对从数十个国家进口的商品征收高达 41% 的新关税，并再次援引他所说的紧急权力，以缩小美国与许多贸易伙伴的贸易赤字。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump announced on Thursday new tariffs of up to 41% on goods imported from dozens of countries, again citing emergency powers he says he is using to shrink the country's trade deficits with many of its trade partners.】

item.title: VIEW 投资者对特朗普宣布新的互惠关税做出反应
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四签署了一项行政命令，对从数十个国家和外国地区进口的美国商品征收10%至41%不等的互惠关税。【原文：President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Thursday imposing reciprocal tariffs ranging from 10% to 41% on U.S. imports from dozens of countries and foreign locations.】

item.title: 格尔道第二季度调整后利润下降近 9%，关税促进美国业务发展
item.description: 巴西钢铁制造商格尔道（Gerdau）周四公布的第二季度调整后净利润同比下降8.6%，略低于分析师预期，尽管北美业务因美国关税而表现强劲。【原文：Brazilian steelmaker Gerdau on Thursday reported an 8.6% decline in its second-quarter adjusted net profit year-on-year, slightly below analysts' expectations despite stronger performance of North American operations due to U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 法国 7 月新车注册量下降 7.66%，特斯拉销量下降 26.57
item.description: 法国汽车机构PFA周五公布的数据显示，7月份法国新车注册量为116377辆，同比下滑7.66%。【原文：New car registrations in France slid 7.66% in July from a year earlier to 116,377 vehicles, data from French car body PFA showed on Friday.】

item.title: 日本 6 月失业率维持在 2.5% 不变
item.description: 日本政府周五公布的数据显示，日本 6 月份的失业率为 2.5%，与上月持平。【原文：Japan's jobless rate in June was unchanged from the previous month at 2.5%, government data showed on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普对数十个国家的出口产品征收 10%至 41%的 "对等 "关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四签署了一项行政命令，对从数十个国家和外国地区进口的美国商品征收10%至41%不等的互惠关税。【原文：President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Thursday imposing reciprocal tariffs ranging from 10% to 41% on U.S. imports from dozens of countries and foreign locations.】

item.title: 白宫表示，特朗普将对加拿大的关税提高至 35
item.description: 白宫表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四签署了一项行政命令，将对加拿大商品征收的关税从25%提高到35%。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Thursday increasing tariffs on Canadian goods to 35% from 25%, the White House said.】
